IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: MENTAL HEALTH COUNSELING - "WE CARE FOR THE MENTAL HEALTH OF OUR COMMUNITY" INPATIENT, OUTPATIENT, AND RESIDENTIAL CARE
IRS990.MissionDesc: MENTAL HEALTH COUNSELING - "WE CARE FOR THE MENTAL HEALTH OF OUR COMMUNITY" INPATIENT, OUTPATIENT, AND RESIDENTIAL CARE
IRS990.Desc: SERVICES FOR THE ADULT POPULATION THAT PRESENT WITH A SEVERE MENTAL ILLNESS OR WITH A SEVERE AND PERSISTENT MENTAL ILLNESS. INCLUDES ACUTE CARE OUTPATIENT SERVICES, RESIDENTIAL SERVICES, EMERGENCY SERVICES, ADDICTION RECOVERY SERVICES, ASSERTIVE CONTINUOUS TREATMENT PROGRAMMING AND RESTORATIVE PARTIAL HOSPITALIZATION SERVICES.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: EMERGENCY SERVICES, ACUTE PSYCHIATRIC RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT, VOCATIONAL, SPECIAL PROJECTS, AND R.P.H.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONSIDERATION HAS BEEN GIVEN TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. THE FEDERAL INCOME TAX RETURNS FOR THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2020, REMAIN OPEN FOR POTENTIAL EXAMINATION BY MAJOR TAX JURISDICTIONS, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY WERE FILED.

SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XII, LINE 2D

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NH HEALTH & ED. FACILITIES AUTH. REFINANCE & ACQ. OF REAL ESTATE
NH HEALTH & ED. FACILITIES AUTH. ACQ. OF REAL ESTATE
EMERGENCY SERVICES, ACUTE PSYCHIATRIC RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT, VOCATIONAL, SPECIAL PROJECTS, AND R.P.H.
WHEN THE FORM 990 HAS BEEN REVIEWED/CORRECTED BY THE CFO AND CONTROLLER, THE DOCUMENT IS REVIEWED/APPROVED BY THE RIVERBEND BOARD FINANCE COMMITTEE.

EACH YEAR THE BOARD IS SENT THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ALONG WITH A CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONNAIRE WHICH THEY ARE ASKED TO COMPLETE AND RETURN TO THE SR. EXECUTIVE ASST. A REPORT IS GENERATED THROUGH A/P WHICH SHOWS IF BOARD MEMBERS HAD ANY RELATED TRANSACTIONS DURING THAT FISCAL YEAR. IF THEY DID, THE TRANSACTIONS ARE INCLUDED IN THE PECUNIARY TRANSACTION FILING.

THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS' EVALUATES THE PERFORMANCE OF THE PRESIDENT/CEO OF THE CORPORATION. THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE SETS THE PRESIDENT/CEO COMPENSATION WHICH IS PRESENTED TO THE FULL BOARD FOR APPROVAL.

THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE REVIEWS COMPARABLE DATA AND SUBSTANTIATION OF THE OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE MAKES DETERMINATIONS UPON THE APPROPRIATE SALARY FOR THE SENIOR MANAGEMENT.

GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE THROUGH NH SEC. OF STATE. THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AND, IN ADDITION, ARE AVAILABLE ON THE INTERNET VIA GUIDESTAR.
